svg.text:
title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 26, 2024" date: "2024-10-26"
Eth News and Links
Eth R&D protocol call (All Core Devs)
* Execution layer focused protocol call (ACDE #199): Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-4 :
issues being debugged & fixed EIP2537 BLS precompile : keeping subgroup checks, STARK
projects unlikely to switch to using due to lack of infrastructure support EIP7742
uncouple blob count between CL/EL : scheduled for inclusion in Pectra Gas limit (set
by validators): discussion on whether to increase validator defaults and what
mechanism to use Engine API revert error codes : proposal to standardize on Geth error
codes
* Pectra upgrade: Pectra-devnet-4 : issues being debugged & fixed EIP2537 BLS
precompile : keeping subgroup checks, STARK projects unlikely to switch to using due
to lack of infrastructure support EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL :
scheduled for inclusion in Pectra
Pectra upgrade:
* Pectra-devnet-4 : issues being debugged & fixed
Pectra-devnet-4 : issues being debugged & fixed
* EIP2537 BLS precompile : keeping subgroup checks, STARK projects unlikely to switch
to using due to lack of infrastructure support
EIP2537 BLS precompile : keeping subgroup checks, STARK projects unlikely to switch to
using due to lack of infrastructure support
* EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : scheduled for inclusion in Pectra
EIP7742 uncouple blob count between CL/EL : scheduled for inclusion in Pectra
* Gas limit (set by validators): discussion on whether to increase validator defaults
and what mechanism to use
Gas limit (set by validators): discussion on whether to increase validator defaults
* Engine API revert error codes : proposal to standardize on Geth error codes
Engine API revert error codes : proposal to standardize on Geth error codes
Pectra (Prague + Electra) upgrade
* Weekly testing call #10 : peerdas-devnet-3 still unfinalized, fusaka-devnet-0 ~1
week away
Amsterdam upgrade
* Stateless implementers call #26 : upcoming Circle SNARK weekly seminars, Verkle
measurements from replaying ~200k historical blocks and gas cost spec discussion
Layer 1
* EIP7732 ePBS: ePBS breakout #12 : support for all-in-one fork choice proposal,
devnet proceeding as planned, consensus specs can then be updated with fork choice
proposal
EIP7732 ePBS:
* ePBS breakout #12 : support for all-in-one fork choice proposal, devnet proceeding
as planned, consensus specs can then be updated with fork choice proposal
* Xatu dataset adds execution layer data in Parquet format from genesis
Xatu dataset adds execution layer data in Parquet format from genesis
Research
* Anders Elowsson: practical endgame on issuance policy , proposes curves to temper
growth or alternatively set a 0.5% issuance rate for now
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
* ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 27.9% , still too close to 33.3% threshold
* Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3% Any client bug over 33.3% could mean
loss of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
* Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
Execution layer: Geth ~52% majority
* Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
Consensus layer: Prysm 37% & Lighthouse 33.3%
* Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
* Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America &
Europe
Better geographic diversity is optimal, particularly outside of North America & Europe
Client Releases
* Execution layer: Erigon v3.0.0-alpha5 : faster time on tip of chain, less time
needed to download blobs, fix for v3.0.0-alpha4 crashes; resync required
* Erigon v3.0.0-alpha5 : faster time on tip of chain, less time needed to download
blobs, fix for v3.0.0-alpha4 crashes; resync required
For stakers
* Update consensus layer clients so the network bandwidth changes of IDONTWANT
messages can be observed
Layer 2
* Helios (light client): adds OP Stack support; demo syncing mainnet, OP Mainnet &
Base
Helios (light client): adds OP Stack support; demo syncing mainnet, OP Mainnet & Base
* Arbitrum One time lock extended to 8 days (up from 3 days)
Arbitrum One time lock extended to 8 days (up from 3 days)
* ApeChain (Arbitrum Orbit L3) live
ApeChain (Arbitrum Orbit L3) live
* Arbitrum Orbit fast withdrawals for AnyTrust chains : up to 15 minute frequency,
trust assumption on fast withdrawals committee
Arbitrum Orbit fast withdrawals for AnyTrust chains : up to 15 minute frequency, trust
assumption on fast withdrawals committee
* L2 Standards EVM equivalence breakout (RollCall #8.1)
L2 Standards EVM equivalence breakout (RollCall #8.1)
EIPs/Standards
* EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals): EIP7791 : GAS2ETH opcode EIP7792 : Verifiable
logs EIP7793 : TXINDEX opcode EIP7797 : Double speed for hash_tree_root
EIPs (Ethereum improvement proposals):
* EIP7791 : GAS2ETH opcode
EIP7791 : GAS2ETH opcode
* EIP7792 : Verifiable logs
EIP7792 : Verifiable logs
* EIP7793 : TXINDEX opcode
EIP7793 : TXINDEX opcode
* EIP7797 : Double speed for hash_tree_root
EIP7797 : Double speed for hash_tree_root
* ERCs (application layer): ERC7794 : Grant registry ERC7795 : Wallet transaction
intents ERC7796 : Conditional send transaction RPC
ERCs (application layer):
* ERC7794 : Grant registry
ERC7794 : Grant registry
* ERC7795 : Wallet transaction intents
ERC7795 : Wallet transaction intents
* ERC7796 : Conditional send transaction RPC
ERC7796 : Conditional send transaction RPC
Stuff for developers
* Foundry forge-std v1.9.4 : adds cheatcodes for gas snapshots, random bytes, mock
calls, debug trace recording, remember keys & get wallets
Foundry forge-std v1.9.4 : adds cheatcodes for gas snapshots, random bytes, mock
* Remix contract verification plugin : verify on Etherscan, Sourcify & Blockscout at
the same time
Remix contract verification plugin : verify on Etherscan, Sourcify & Blockscout at the
same time
* PRBMath v4.1.0 (Solidity library): adds UD21x18 alias for uint128 & SD21x18 alias
for int128
PRBMath v4.1.0 (Solidity library): adds UD21x18 alias for uint128 & SD21x18 alias for
int128
* Etherscan API v2 : multichain with single API key for all supported chains, beta
Etherscan API v2 : multichain with single API key for all supported chains, beta
* Coinbase OnchainKit Checkout (React component): accepts USDC payments
Coinbase OnchainKit Checkout (React component): accepts USDC payments
* Safe multisig transaction hashes : Bash script to generate Safe transaction hashes
to cross-check with Ledger; Safe hash preview : hosted UI with additional trust
assumptions
Safe multisig transaction hashes : Bash script to generate Safe transaction hashes to
cross-check with Ledger; Safe hash preview : hosted UI with additional trust
* Veritas : Circom circuit testing using Go
Veritas : Circom circuit testing using Go
Security
* Tapioca DAO $4.7M exploit via private key compromise starting with fake job offer on
LinkedIn
Tapioca DAO $4.7M exploit via private key compromise starting with fake job offer on
* DAO governance common vulnerabilities
DAO governance common vulnerabilities
Ecosystem
* More Vitalik explainers on Ethereum roadmap: Minimize staking centralization risks
(the Scourge) : fix block construction pipeline and staking economics Easy block
verification (the Verge) : stateless verification (Verkle or STARKs) and validity
proofs of EVM execution & consensus
More Vitalik explainers on Ethereum roadmap:
* Minimize staking centralization risks (the Scourge) : fix block construction
pipeline and staking economics
Minimize staking centralization risks (the Scourge) : fix block construction pipeline
and staking economics
* Easy block verification (the Verge) : stateless verification (Verkle or STARKs) and
validity proofs of EVM execution & consensus
Easy block verification (the Verge) : stateless verification (Verkle or STARKs) and
* Hackathon projects: ETHGlobal San Francisco finalists & ETHSofia
Hackathon projects: ETHGlobal San Francisco finalists & ETHSofia
Enterprise
* Stripe acquiring Bridge (stablecoin payments) for a reported $1.1B
Job Listings
* Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
Sigma Prime is hiring Rust developers and security engineers. Remote roles !
* Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Executive Director for Enterprise Ethereum Alliance
Job listings: $600 for 4 issues (75 char limit). Pay using 3cities. Questions?
abcoathup at-gmail
Onchain stats
* Fees (via ultrasound.money ): Gas: 3.4 to 96 gwei, 11.3 gwei average; zero net
issuance at 24.2 gwei 11k ETH net issuance this week
Fees (via ultrasound.money ):
* Gas: 3.4 to 96 gwei, 11.3 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.2 gwei
Gas: 3.4 to 96 gwei, 11.3 gwei average; zero net issuance at 24.2 gwei
* 11k ETH net issuance this week
11k ETH net issuance this week
* ETHUSD : $2,399 - $2,747, currently $2,440, all time high $4,878
ETHUSD : $2,399 - $2,747, currently $2,440, all time high $4,878
* ETHBTC : currently 0.037 (Flippening at ~0.164)
ETHBTC : currently 0.037 (Flippening at ~0.164)
Notable at app layer
* Rune: proposals to recenter Maker brand
Rune: proposals to recenter Maker brand
* Kain Warwick: retrospective of Infinex patron sale rather than a VC seed round
Kain Warwick: retrospective of Infinex patron sale rather than a VC seed round
* Safe multichain deployment : deploy at same address, no gas fees on major L2s
Safe multichain deployment : deploy at same address, no gas fees on major L2s
* Gitcoin Grants 22 : open source software rounds on Arbitrum; mint attestations of
donations
Gitcoin Grants 22 : open source software rounds on Arbitrum; mint attestations of
* AD : Buy an NFT to tweet once as @evan_van_ness . Auction ends Monday morning, some
restrictions apply
AD : Buy an NFT to tweet once as @evan_van_ness . Auction ends Monday morning, some
Regulation/business/tokens
* Binance employee Tigran Gambaryan released from Nigeria
Binance employee Tigran Gambaryan released from Nigeria
* WSJ reports that Tether is under investigation by SDNY ; CEO denies
WSJ reports that Tether is under investigation by SDNY ; CEO denies
General
* Transak third party KYC vendor data breach via compromised employee credentials
Transak third party KYC vendor data breach via compromised employee credentials
* Secp256k1-node vulnerability allows private key extraction over ECDH
Secp256k1-node vulnerability allows private key extraction over ECDH
END OF SERVICE: plan to deprecate Week in Ethereum News
Editor: @abcoathup Follow @WeekinEthNews for the most clicked links Permalink:
https://weekinethereumnews.com/week-in-ethereum-news-october-26-2024
Upcoming Dates of Note
(new/changes in bold )
* Nov 12-15 â€“ Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
Nov 12-15 â€“ Devcon 7 - Southeast Asia (Bangkok)
* Nov 15-17 â€“ ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
Nov 15-17 â€“ ETHGlobal Bangkok hackathon
* Dec 6-8 â€“ ETHIndia hackathon
Dec 6-8 â€“ ETHIndia hackathon
